CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( CPL_Operation_Stages__c , "Deactivated") , ISPICKVAL( OB_Operation_Stage__c , "Deactivated") , ISPICKVAL( Operational_Stage_Hot_Leads__c , "Deactivated"), ISPICKVAL( Operational_Stages__c , "Deactivated Customer"), ISPICKVAL( Premier_Partner_Operation_Stage__c , "Deactivated")) , TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.label: Deactivated
